channel.title: Code on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Code on PR

item.title: Book Recommendation: Testing with coffeescript by Jack Franklin [Free ebook]
item.description: TDD (Test Driven Development) was introduced to me around 2006 with PHPUnit. As a naive, I couldn’t see the benefits, eg.

item.title: Prj - Times of India epub
item.description: Remember my old post about the TOI - Epub project? Yesterday, I published the source on github. If anyone still interested, go ahead and take a look at the source.

item.title: iForce - Sublime text plugin for salesforce development.
item.description: I wrote a small plugin for sublime text to develop salesforce. I’m glad to share one of my idea to project execution.

item.title: Idea to action: Tile this
item.description: Not many of my ideas are converted to a project, this one has seen its light last week. Though I haven’t completed all the UI and features of my original vision, it is better to have one working idea than nothing.

item.title: RIL2Insta - Import Read it Later links to Instapaper
item.description: One of my long time wish to write a Chrome extension completed last week. It all started when my answer was down-voted at apple.

item.title: Shell script to generate images for testing
item.description: Recently I was in need of generating sample images for no. of products in my db. I really hate to create a copy of image for each products in my db.

item.title: Recommended Git workflow
item.description: I recently started using Git as my revision control tool. Impressed by the use of branching and merging, I create and merge a lot of branches.

item.title: My Userscripts
item.description: Finally decided to copy all my published userscripts.org codes here. AnchorFree banner killer Remove Banner from the top when you use Anchor Free Hotspot shield / Please deactivate the script after disconnecting Hotspot shield

item.title: Comments - HSBC.php
item.description: This page contains comments for the post - HSBC.php i found error bool(false) Prakaash - Feb 4, 2010

item.title: HSBC.php
item.description: <?php /** * @desc Class to process payment using HSBC gateway * This class will return orderhash * 18-Dec-2006 */ class HSBC{ var $storeFrontId; var $hashFilePath; var $CPIhash; var $orderHash; /** * @desc initialize configuration arguements.

item.title: function.php
item.description: <?php /** * @desc Function to print variable for debugging */ function printPre($data, $extended=false) { echo "<pre>"; if($extended) { var_dump($data); } else { print_r($data); } echo "</pre>"; } ?

item.title: hsbc_return.php
item.description: <?php require_once "function.php"; require_once "HSBC.php"; printPre($_POST); $h1 = new HSBC(); echo $h1->error($_POST['CpiResultsCode']); ?>
